nodes.name: project
nodes.description: Any specifically defined piece of work that is undertaken or attempted to meet a single requirement. (NCIt C47885)

properties.name: administering_ic
properties.description: The NIH Institute or Center (IC) to which the Center for Scientific Review (CSR) routes NIH grant applications for a funding decision. An IC may request to change this assignment if the application is more suited to another IC. Also referred to as primary assignment.

properties.name: availability_mechanism
properties.description: Mechanism by which the project will be made available.

properties.name: availability_type
properties.description: Is the project open or restricted?

properties.name: code
properties.description: Unique identifier for the project.

properties.name: data_description
properties.description: The description of the type of data found in the data set.

properties.name: date_collected
properties.description: The date or date range in which the project data was collected.

properties.name: dbgap_accession_number
properties.description: The dbgap accession number provided for the project.

properties.name: institution
properties.description: Public or Private entity, including Government Agencies.

properties.name: intended_release_date
properties.description: Tracks a Project's intended release date.

properties.name: investigator
properties.description: A researcher(s) in a study who oversees multiple aspects of the study, such as concept development, protocol writing, protocol submission for IRB approval, participant recruitment, informed consent, data collection, analysis, interpretation and presentation.

properties.name: investigator_affiliation
properties.description: The investigator's affiliation with respect to a research institution.

properties.name: investigator_name
properties.description: Name of the principal investigator for the project.

properties.name: location
properties.description: Location of the partaking institution (Public or Private entity, including Government Agencies).

properties.name: name
properties.description: Display name/brief description for the project.

properties.name: project_title
properties.description: Title of the NIH-funded project.

properties.name: releasable
properties.description: A project can only be released by the user when `releasable` is true.

properties.name: released
properties.description: To release a project is to tell the GDC to include all submitted entities in the next GDC index.

properties.name: research_focus_area
properties.description: Description of the Research Focus Area.

properties.name: research_program
properties.description: Name of the NIH-registered Research Program.

properties.name: support_id
properties.description: The ID of the source providing support/grant resources.

properties.name: support_source
properties.description: The name of source providing support/grant resources.

properties.name: year_awarded
properties.description: Year in which NIH awarded the funding project.

properties.name: project.id
properties.description: A unique identifier for records in this 'project' table.

nodes.name: clinical_trial_file
nodes.description: The restricted access file containing patient level data associated with a clinical trial.

properties.name: data_category
properties.description: Broad categorization of the contents of the data file.

properties.name: data_format
properties.description: Format of the data files.

properties.name: data_type
properties.description: Specific content type of the data file.

properties.name: file_name
properties.description: The name (or part of a name) of a file (of any type).

properties.name: file_size
properties.description: The size of the data file (object) in bytes.

properties.name: md5sum
properties.description: The 128-bit hash value expressed as a 32 digit hexadecimal number used as a file's digital fingerprint.

properties.name: object_id
properties.description: The GUID of the object in the index service.

properties.name: project.id
properties.description: Unique identifiers for records in the 'project' table that relate via this foreign key to records in this 'clinical_trial_file' table.

properties.name: clinical_trial_file.id
properties.description: A unique identifier for records in this 'clinical_trial_file' table.

nodes.name: open_access_doc
nodes.description: Open access documents related to a specific clinical trial.

properties.name: data_category
properties.description: Broad categorization of the contents of the data file.

properties.name: data_format
properties.description: Format of the data files.

properties.name: data_type
properties.description: Specific content type of the data file.

properties.name: doc_url
properties.description: The originating URL of the document.

properties.name: file_name
properties.description: The name (or part of a name) of a file (of any type).

properties.name: file_size
properties.description: The size of the data file (object) in bytes.

properties.name: md5sum
properties.description: The 128-bit hash value expressed as a 32 digit hexadecimal number used as a file's digital fingerprint.

properties.name: object_id
properties.description: The GUID of the object in the index service.

properties.name: project.id
properties.description: Unique identifiers for records in the 'project' table that relate via this foreign key to records in this 'open_access_doc' table.

properties.name: open_access_doc.id
properties.description: A unique identifier for records in this 'open_access_doc' table.
